location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.4775 of 1853 from Arthur Malet, Chief Secretary of the Government, Bombay, to Captain Arnold Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is a confirmation of receipt of Kemball's previous letter (folios 355-56), relating to the slave trade on the Arab coast of the Gulf. Malet writes that His Lordship in Council approves of Kemball's proceedings.
